attributes.action: Accept that we don't want a Prime Minister, who is Scottish, to claim any political credit from the English rugby team getting to the World Cup final
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The success of the team is down to their heart and soul and the support of those who live in England.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
